content.prompt: A historian would most likely use the passage as evidence for which of the following in the nineteenth century?

choices.label: The economic conditions of educated middle- and upper-class women
The participation of women in radical political movements

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
